Original:
五星級評價！
內格羅尼（negroni），味道苦澀而濃鬱，辛巴威士忌（Zimbabwhiskey），紅心味甘甜。每次到京城，都要好好喝一杯。
下繼龍馬街道院醫院在一片歡呼聲中再次重聚！ 」

五顆星！
我點了一杯內格羅尼，味道濃鬱，苦樂參半，還有辛巴威士忌，有甜甜的紅番石榴味。
兩者都非常光滑可口。
下次去麥凱醫院，我一定會再回來喝一杯！

五顆星！
內格羅尼（Negroni）的苦味和甜味完美平衡，津巴布韋威士忌（Zimbabwhiskey）則具有紅番石榴的甜香。
兩種飲料都非常順滑可口。
下次去馬凱醫院還想再來這裡喝一杯！
EN:
Five -star evaluation!
Negroni, the taste is bitter and rich, Zimbabwhiskey, the red heart is sweet.Every time I go to Beijing, I have to drink a drink.
Lower Longma Street Hospital reunited again in a cheering!"

Five stars!
I ordered a cup of Negranini, with a strong taste, half -biting, and Simba whiskey, with sweet red -bar guava flavor.
Both are very smooth and delicious.
Next time I go to McKay Hospital, I will definitely come back for another drink!

Five stars!
Negroni's bitterness and sweetness are perfectly balanced, while Zimbabwhiskey has the sweet fragrance of red pomegranate.
Both drinks are very smooth and delicious.
Next time I go to Ma Kai Hospital and want to come here for another drink!

Original: 我去過的最好的酒吧之一。融合台灣風味和當地食材的美味雞尾酒。調酒師都非常知識淵博、友好且熱情。我們嘗試的所有飲料都很棒。如果這家酒吧在未來幾年內沒有躋身亞洲 50 家最佳酒吧之列，我會感到驚訝。
EN: One of the best bars I have ever been to.Fusion of Taiwan's flavor and local ingredients.The bartender is very knowledgeable, friendly and enthusiastic.All the drinks we tried are great.If this bar has not ranked among the 50 best bars in Asia in the next few years, I will be surprised.

Original:
我用它來和我的公司成員一起舉辦派對，但服務很糟糕。
也許由於語言問題，我的意圖沒有很好地表達出來，但我以為一瓶威士忌算一滿杯。
如果能透過後續的溝通立即解決問題就好了，但是聽到人家說得好像什麼也沒說一樣，非常不愉快。
當老闆就在我旁邊時，店員卻堅持自己的意見，這讓我真的很尷尬。對外國人一點也不友善。我很震驚地看到如果我喜歡他他就會試圖控制我。我很難在這裡表達我的意圖。
我一開始就告訴他們，即使不順利，我為什麼要對一個點了足夠喝一整瓶的顧客說這些呢？ ？我懷疑這家店的標準。
其他店員還好，但是那個傲慢的男店員的態度確實是最差的。
另外，還遭到不熟悉店內狀況的顧客的質問，這讓我對整間店的士氣產生了質疑。商店是否有不管理違反公共道德的顧客的政策？我明白公司的經營方針是利潤至上，從不考慮顧客的感受。

我不推薦這個地方，因為員工和顧客的品質都是最差的。正如其他人所說，即使外面有人吵鬧，他們也可能不會去管。我去過幾十家酒吧，這是迄今為止最糟糕的。
我會保留記錄，盡可能減少受害者人數。
EN:
I used it to hold a party with my company members, but the service was bad.
Perhaps because of language problems, my intention did not express well, but I thought a bottle of whiskey was a full cup.
It would be good if you can immediately solve the problem immediately through subsequent communication, but he heard that people seem to say nothing, very unhappy.
When the boss was next to me, the clerk insisted on his opinions, which made me really embarrassed.Not friendly to foreigners at all.I was shocked to see that if I like him, he will try to control me.It is difficult for me to express my intention here.
I told them from the beginning that even if I didn't go well, why did I say this to a full bottle of customers?IntersectionI suspect the standard of this store.
Other clerks are okay, but the attitude of the arrogant male clerk is indeed the worst.
In addition, customers who were not familiar with the situation in the store were questioned, which made me question the morale of the whole store.Does the store have policies that do not manage customers who violate public ethics?I understand that the company's business policy is the first profit, and I never consider the feelings of customers.

I don't recommend this place because the quality of employees and customers is the worst.As other people say, even if someone is noisy outside, they may not care.I have been to dozens of bars, which is the worst so far.
I will retain the record and minimize the number of victims as much as possible.

Original: 在台灣獨自旅行度過了最美好的夜晚之一，只是在酒吧與員工和顧客聊天。創意雞尾酒和經典雞尾酒都很棒。調酒師安東尼為我調製了最好、最樸素的內格羅尼，非常注重細節。感謝你們的精彩主持和美好的時光。
EN: Traveling alone in Taiwan has spent one of the most beautiful nights, just chatting with employees and customers in a bar.Creative cocktails and classic cocktails are great.The bartender Anthony prepared the best and simplene Negrani for me, paying great attention to details.Thank you for your wonderful hosting and good times.
